sentence: Given the possibility of recounts and the need for official certifications, it is unlikely that final results in all races will be available tonight.? In the race for governor, state Sen. Doug Mastriano, known for advancing debunked claims that the 2020 election was stolen from Trump, has won the GOP primary, NBC News projects.
title: Oz, McCormick locked in nail-biter as Pa. GOP Senate primary results trickle in

sentence: On Jan. 6, both the front-runner in Pennsylvanias Republican gubernatorial primary state Sen. Doug Mastriano (R) and one of the leading candidates for the states Republican Senate nomination Kathy Barnette were in Washington.

title: In a GOP primary, support for Jan. 6 isnt an obstacle. Is it an asset?

sentence: Trump backed Pennsylvania state Sen. Doug Mastriano (R) only in the closing days of the Commonwealths primary, long after it became clear Mastriano who was in Washington during the Jan. 6 insurrection would win the Republican nod.

title: Governors races spoil Trumps once-unblemished endorsement record

sentence: And in Pennsylvanias GOP race for governor, Trumps endorsed candidate, the far-right Doug Mastriano, easily won the nomination though he was already well ahead in the polls when Trump weighed in just days before the primary.
title: Takeaways: Election denier wins, bad behavior dooms Cawthorn

sentence: Trump-endorsed state Sen. Doug Mastriano also won the nomination for Pennsylvania governor, but he was already well on track to victory before Trump backed him in recent days.

title: 6 takeaways from primaries in Pennsylvania, North Carolina and more

sentence: In a last-minute endorsement that rattled members of Pennsylvanias Republican party, Trump backed Mastriano, a leading force in trying to overturn the 2020 election results who was pictured outside the Capitol on Jan. 6. There is no one in Pennsylvania who has done more, or fought harder, for Election Integrity than State Senator Doug Mastriano,? Trump said last week.
title: How Trump-backed candidates fared on the busiest primary day

sentence: Also in Pennsylvania, Trump-endorsed gubernatorial candidate Doug Mastriano, an ardent backer of Trump's baseless claims victory was stolen from him in the 2020 presidential election, won the primary.

title: High-profile candidates endorsed by Trump lost their primaries, showing the limits of his power over the party

sentence: ___ HARRISBURG, Pa. Doug Mastriano has won the Republican nomination for Pennsylvania governor, overcoming an eleventh-hour push by the state's GOP political establishment to consolidate support around an alternative in the crowded primary.

title: Midterm updates | Idaho Gov. Little defeats Trump-backed foe

sentence: Un negador de elecciones podra tener poder sobre las elecciones de Pensilvania de 2024 En el senador estatal Doug Mastriano, los republicanos de Pensilvania han nominado para gobernador a una voz destacada que promueve las mentiras de Trump sobre el fraude electoral, lo que aumenta la posibilidad de que alguien que ya intent anular la voluntad de los votantes en 2020 tendra poder sobre la maquinaria electoral de uno de los estados de campo de batalla presidencial ms importantes de la nacin en 2024.
